name: Real-Time Game Tycoon
description:
Learn about real-time game network models such as LAN, Peer-to-Peer, and Dedicated Game Servers in this educational simulation game.

Players learn about these network models by maintaining a simulated game company that uses these models to keep players happy and buying their game.

With a How To Play section and Credits section they can become more educated about the topic with unique network visualizations and external referenced resources.
